quotes.quote: Terrorism is the use of indiscriminate violence for political ends. It has a logic, even if it is one we mostly do not care to understand.
Terrorism is what we call the violence of the weak, and we condemn it; war is what we call the violence of the strong, and we glorify it.
Terrorism has no religion, terrorists have no religion and they are friends of no religion.
Terrorism will never cease in a country where the so called leaders are criminals and terrorists in disguise.
Terrorism can go anywhere where there is not strong government, or government that cannot control its hinterlands.
We do not create terrorism by fighting the terrorists. We invite terrorism by ignoring them.
Terrorism is the intentional use of, or threat to use violence against civilians or against civilian targets, in order to attain political aims.
Terrorism is always one bad day away from being issue No. 1.
Terrorism against our nation will not stand.
Terrorism is the tactic of demanding the impossible, and demanding it at gunpoint.
Terrorism has no religion is a theory, and the religion of terrorism is a real threat and practical thing.
Terrorism has become the systematic weapon of a war that knows no borders or seldom has a face.
Any terrorism is an attack on libertarian values.

Terrorism, like viruses, is everywhere. There is a global perfusion of terrorism, which accompanies any system of domination as though it were its shadow, ready to activate itself anywhere, like a double agent.
Terrorism is the preferred weapon of weak and evil men.
Terrorism works better as a tactic for dictatorships, or for would-be dictators, than for revolutionaries.
Terrorism is just a whole other level of anger management issues.
It terrorism happened because intelligence, leadership and police failures made it possible.
The terrorism is not in the bombs, in your hands; the terrorism is in your unconscious.
Terrorism grows when there are no other options, and when the center of the global economy is the god of money and not the person men and women this is already the first terrorism!
Terrorism is a psychological warfare. Terrorists try to manipulate us and change our behavior by creating fear, uncertainty, and division in society.
What distinguishes terrorism is the willful and calculated choice of innocents as targets.
Everybody's worried about stopping terrorism. Well, there's a really easy way: stop participating in it.
Terrorism is a significant threat to peace and security, prosperity and people.
If you want to end terrorism, you have to stop being terrorists
Terrorism is the war of the poor, and war is the terrorism of the rich.
Terrorism is global and can come from even remote countries.
Terrorism must be outlawed by all civilized nations, not explained or rationalized, but fought and eradicated. Nothing can, nothing will justify the murder of innocent people and helpless children.
The terrible thing about terrorism is that ultimately it destroys those who practice it. Slowly but surely, as they try to extinguish life in others, the light within them dies.
Terrorism has no nationality or religion.
